alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:54PM EDT until July 24 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cayuga County in central New York... Northeastern Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Venice Center to near Genoa to near Taughannock Falls, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Groton, Locke, Genoa, Moravia, Sempronius, Venice Center, Montville and Scipio Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
